title: The 20 Best Lingerie Brands to Take a Spot in Your Top Drawer
excerpt: From ultra-sexy to minimalistic to just pure fun, there’s lingerie out there for every version of you. Shop the best lingerie brands for women now.
text: Inclusive Skin ShadesLove, Vera Unlined Underwire Balconette Bra Adding a lace balconette bra into your everyday rotation is a surefire way to boost your confidence. Love, Vera is a Black-owned brand that offers an assortment of “nude” shades for every kind of skin complexion. I purchased every color and have been wearing them for a few months now. For reference, I’m a natural size 36D. For me, it provides a slight lift, the lace is not itchy and flatters the body, comfortable to wear all day and hand-washes well. The colors are beautiful and the bra is quality. Happy shopping!”Full Coverage LaceSimone Perele Scenario Full Coverage PlungeSimone Perele is celebrated for its classic French-inspired approach to lingerie, crafting designs that empower women to embrace their natural shape and feel confident. html:
Inclusive Skin Shades

Love, Vera Unlined Underwire Balconette Bra

Adding a lace balconette bra into your everyday rotation is a surefire way to boost your confidence. Love, Vera is a Black-owned brand that offers an assortment of “nude” shades for every kind of skin complexion.

Best for: Everyday lace

Material: 87% polyamide, 13% elastane

Sizes: 32A-44DD

Price range: $

Customer review: “I was so excited to find actual nude bras. I purchased every color and have been wearing them for a few months now. For reference, I’m a natural size 36D. For me, it provides a slight lift, the lace is not itchy and flatters the body, comfortable to wear all day and hand-washes well. The colors are beautiful and the bra is quality. Happy shopping!”

Full Coverage Lace

Simone Perele Scenario Full Coverage Plunge

Simone Perele is celebrated for its classic French-inspired approach to lingerie, crafting designs that empower women to embrace their natural shape and feel confident. This full-coverage lace bra embodies timeless elegance with a modern twist.

Best for: The lace lover

Material: 40% Polyester, 56% Polyamide, 4% Elastane

Sizes: 32B-38E

Price range: $

Customer review: “My favorite bustier, I love how well this one fits, plus it looks great when peeking out of a top.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Ultimate Classics

Cosabella Soire Confidence Low Rise Bikini

The Italian-inspired brand Cosabella has been creating lingerie that’s both practical and beautiful since 1983. True to its name, which means “beautiful thing” in Italian, even its simplest underwear is designed to feel practical and pretty.

Best for: Practical and sexy pieces

Material: 100% polyamide

Price range: $

Customer review: “They fit perfectly and are so comfortable. will definitely purchase again and again.”

Lace Strapless

Dora Larsen Noa Graphic Lace Strapless Bra

Dora Larsen, founded in 2016 by Georgia Larsen, blends innovative colors with contemporary lingerie designs to create comfortable and inspiring pieces. Named after her childhood dog, the brand empowers women to wear elevated, everyday lingerie that makes them feel true to themselves.

Best for: Everyday contemporary lingerie

Material: 83% recycled pre-consumer nylon 17% elastane

Price range: $

Customer review: “Lovely piece, felt super comfy and supportive enough to wear all day. I felt gorgeous!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Daring Bustiers

Journelle Cristiana Bustier

The name Journelle comes from the French word “journellement,” meaning daily, and it’s based on the idea that lingerie that blends strength and beauty is a must-have luxury—something that empowers every woman’s daily routine. And well, it’s easy to feel luxe in a beautiful lace bustier like this one.

Best for: French-inspired

Material: 56% Polymide, 30% Polyester, 14% Elastane; Contrast: 83% Polymide, 17% Elastane

Price range: $$

Customer review: “They fit perfectly and are so comfortable. will definitely purchase again and again.”

Comfort Made Sexy

Lounge Maisie Intimates Set

If you’re after a sexy set or just simple basics, check out Lounge for all of your undergarment needs. With thongs in every color and pieces as sweet, simple or sexy as you want, the brand is perfect for those who want a little of everything from their lingerie.

Best for: The multi-tasker

Material: Recycled polyamide, elastane

Sizes: 30A-38G

Price range: $

Customer review: “I feel so sexy! I have pretty large boobs and this fits really comfortably surprisingly. I was really just buying it because it was cute but it’s actually really cozy!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chic & Cheeky

Kiki de Montparnasse Forget Me Not Silk-Blend Satin-Trimmed Embellished Metallic Tulle Chemise

Kiki de Montparnasse aims to blur the lines between dressing and undressing. The brand’s lingerie, sleepwear, and ready-to-wear all have a hint (or more than a hint) of seduction, which makes it one of our favorite brands to wear.

Best for: The romantic

Material: Polyester, nylon, silk, elastane

Sizes: XS-L

Price range: $$-$$$

The Perfect Basic

CUUP The Balconette Mesh

CUUP is a great brand if you want no-nonsense undergarments. These are the pieces that will be staples in your wardrobe, even if they’re unseen. “CUUP stands out from the average lingerie brand because it prioritizes comfort that doesn’t compromise on style, sexiness, and support,” says Torres.

Best for: The minimalist

Material: Nylon, spandex

Sizes: 30A-44H

Price range: $

Customer review: “These bras are works of art that you can wear and feel comfortable, confident, and sexy. I’ve been on the search for the perfect bra, and tried many sites and lingerie boutiques but the hunt ends here!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

For the Girl’s Girl

For Love & Lemons Brie Garter Skirt

For Love & Lemons is a brand best known for its coquettish, cottagecore-style lingerie and flowery dresses. If you have a penchant for dainty designs and feminine florals, this is sure to be your one-stop shop.

Best for: The girly-girl

Material: Polyester, recycled polyester, elastane

Sizes: 2XS-XL

Price range: $-$$

The Luxury Option

La Perla Black Honeycomb Shadows Corset

La Perla is top of the game when it comes to lingerie. If you (or your significant other) can splurge, it’s definitely an investment worth making. After all, it’s going on your body, so why not choose the best of the best?

Best for: The high-end shopper

Material: Silk, elastane

Sizes: 32A-36D

Price range: $$-$$$

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Accessible Luxury

Intimissimi Pretty Flowers Babydoll

Intimissimi has a really great selection of basic and not-so-basic lingerie pieces. From bodysuits to slips to bra & panty sets, if you’re looking for classic, accessible luxury, this is the place to go!

Best for: Proponents of easy elegance

Material: Polyester, satin, elastane

Sizes: 34B-38C

Price range: $-$$

Customer review: “Very beautiful. I was surprised how soft this babydoll was and how lovely it looks in person!”

Perfectly Practical

Negative Underwear Sieve Trim Bralette

For those after a simple and sleek look, Negative Underwear is the brand to shop. Not everyone loves lacy lingerie, excessive straps, or intricate bows and buttons. This brand is simple and practical enough to wear every day, for any occasion.

Best for: The comfort seeker

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Sizes: 0-5

Price range: $

Customer review: “Loooove this fit! So comfortable and soooo flattering.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

For Every Body

Skims Fits Everybody Lace Onesie

Skims does simple well, but the lingerie and statement pieces are also something to behold. Because we know that if there’s one thing Kim K. is going to get right, it’s self-empowered sex appeal.

Best for: Petite and plus sizes

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Sizes: 2XS-4XL

Price range: $

Customer review: “The onesie is really comfortable and so cute. It was definitely worth my money! I love it sooo much!”

Most Inclusive

Parade Comfort Contour Corset

Striving to be comfortable and eco-conscious, Parade makes lingerie for everybody—and every body. With fun colors and both classic and kitsch designs, this brand is definitely marked by inclusion and accessibility.

Best for: The budget-friendly shopper

Material: Sustainable cotton

Sizes: XS-3XL

Price range: $

Customer review: “Comfortable, light and great for lounging.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Gamechanger

Savage x Fenty Lace Deux Midi Slip

Rihanna changed the game when it came to accessible lingerie. Sure, other brands have been breaking the mold for years, but with radical body positivity, size inclusion, bright, bold colors, and out-of-the-box lingerie fashion shows, the Savage x Fenty founder gave the lingerie industry the reset it needed.

Best for: The modern muse

Material: Polyamide, elastane

Sizes: XS-4X

Price range: $

Customer review: “My new favorite piece of lingerie. I honestly cannot hype this item enough. When I tried it on, I did not want to take it off! It fit so perfectly and hugged my curves just right.”

Hopeless Romanticism

Fleur du Mal Strappy Bondage Underwire Bodysuit

Fleur du Mal does sexy in a way that’s feminine and fun. Florals (of course) are a major theme in the collection, but you’ll also find quirky prints and designs, lace bodysuits, and classic black lingerie that will never go out of style.

Best for: The daydreamer

Material: Silk, elastane, cotton

Sizes: XS-L

Price range: $-$$$

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Fun & Flirty

Araks Gita Underwire Bra Mist

Araks is for those who have a playful side. Youthful and comfortable, the brand’s colorful sets will make you feel happy for any occasion. How can you not have fun in bright green undies?

Best for: The young at heart

Material: Silk, elastane

Sizes: 32A-36D

Price Range: $-$$

Playful & Provocative

Agent Provocateur Velvetta Thong

Another go-to when it comes to classic, sexy lingerie is Agent Provocateur. This lingerie is for women who know what they want and aren’t afraid to take it.

Best for: The material girl

Material: Polyamide, polyester

Sizes: 32B-36E

Price range: $$-$$$

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sweet & Seductive

Kat the Label Maverick Set

Sweet and seductive, Kat the Label finds a balance for those who want lacy lingerie, without going overboard. From lacy sleepwear to lovely bra/panty sets, the brand is perfect for everyday wear, but its bridal selection is great, too!

Best for: The honeymooner

Material: Poly, elastane

Sizes: XS-XL

Price range: $

Customer review: “Absolutely love it...just purchased another set in white for my wedding and will be buying the red and black when they’re back in stock in my size! Cannot recommend enough.”

Treat Yourself

Bluebella Coppelia Eco Bra Shoots

Bluebella takes lingerie sets to a new level. You can find really any aesthetic, colorway, material, or pattern in its collections! Bluebella’s founder and CEO, Emily Bendell, notes that “the Bluebella woman does not see lingerie as a functional or traditionally sexy purchase to be dressed up in for someone else.”

Best for: The self-love enthusiast

Material: Recycled polyester

Sizes: 30A-38DD/E

Price range: $
